messages.content:
You are a media content analyst. You are analyzing the following text to extract {prompt_names}. {prompt_names_and_descriptions_parentheses}. For every question pick only options from these lists.
{prompt_options}

You will pick one option for these questions: {single_choice_prompts}. You will pick one or more options for these prompts: {multiple_choice_prompts}.
Text will be in Czech language. JSON anwers will be in same language as the options are.
Return answers as a JSON object.
